short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamlines your Google Search Console workflows. Data aggregation, quick-links and much more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GSC Helper: Your New Favorite Tool for Supercharging Google Search Console Workflows

ðŸ”§ Top Features You'll Love:
âœ” Visualize Performance Data by Week, Month, or Quarter: Go beyond daily views and get a broader perspective.
âœ” Quickly Set and Compare Dates: Easily select date ranges such as 'last month', 'month to date' or compare 'last month' with 'one year ago'.
âœ” Leverage Powerful RegEx Filters: Use preset or custom RegEx filters to find queries or URLs based on specific criteria (e.g., questions, word count, URLs without a trailing slash, ...).
âœ” Analyze Traffic Share by URL or Folder: Identify your top-performing pages and folders with ease.
âœ” Uncover Additional Data Points for Your Queries: Explore more detailed insights for your search queries, e.g. keyword coverage percentages.
âœ” Track Query Performance Trends: Monitor the growth and shifts in your queries, both in absolute numbers and % changes.
âœ” Spot Traffic Changes for Pages: View absolute numbers and % changes for your pages, and aggregate the data by folders for additional insights.
âœ” One-Click GSC Access: Instantly open the current page in GSC using your preferred settings.
âœ” Multi-Account Support: Seamlessly switch between Google accounts without losing filters or settings.
âœ” Extract Sample URLs with One Click: Easily gather URLs from tables, like crawling errors.
âœ” Access GSC Reports via Context Menu: Quickly open various GSC reports with a right-click.

ðŸŽ‰ And More Features Are Coming Soon!

ðŸ”’ Your Privacy Matters
GSC Helper doesnâ€™t need access to your Google Search Console properties. It reads and visualizes data from your current browser tab upon request, displaying it in a new tab within your browser. Your data is never shared.

ðŸ¤” How Does GSC Helper Work? 
When you're in Google Search Console, simply click the plugin logo to generate enhanced charts or tables. By your request, GSC Helper parses the source code of your current tab to extract and visualize the data you want. Everything happens locally in your browser.

ðŸ’¡ Discover searchanalyzer.io
Unlock even deeper insights into your Google Search Console data with searchanalyzer.io. Instead of just creating new content, focus on enhancing your top-performing pages. Learn how searchanalyzer.io can help you optimize your existing content for better results.
